text: Yi kanɨmavin ha nɨmata, yindahara kru ñɨmbi naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ karatamahu nurɨŋandɨ tɨwɨyɨ kɨndin. Yandɨ saŋganzara haŋɨnɨŋ yandɨ tɨwɨyɨ kɨndu. Kamataharɨm muhamarɨm uhu vamba ambahin, undi. Pañɨ vamba ambahin, pandi. Ara yandɨ sɨmbɨrakaraŋ uta kaŋgɨm sɨmbɨra mɨŋa vamba ambahin, uta mɨŋandi, vami.
